"MORBIUS",2006,6
It's Morbius: The Living Vampire versus Blade: The Vampire Hunter in a no-fang-barred battle- with Spider-Man in the middle and reporter Ben Urich's life hanging in the balance! Part 2 (of 2)
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
